pkgmetadata.longdescription: Loading Facebook and Instagram Advertising Data from 'Smartly.io' // Aims at loading Facebook and Instagram advertising data from 'Smartly.io' into R. 'Smartly.io' is an online advertising service that enables advertisers to display commercial ads on social media networks (see http://www.smartly.io/ for more information). The package offers an interface to query the 'Smartly.io' API and loads data directly into R for further data processing and data analysis.
